name: Tree Slam
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a minion adjacent to you.
- Remove a ::token_tree:: Tree token adjacent to you. Target a unit in range.

name: Makeshift Weapon
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Remove a ::token_tree:: Tree token adjacent to you. Target a hero in range.

name: Mystic Saplings
text: Place up to 3 ::token_tree:: Tree tokens in radius; Tree tokens are not removed at the end of the round.

name: March of Nature
text: Each time after you resolve a card, you may place a ::token_tree:: Tree token in radius.

name: Gifts of Nature
text:
Remove a ::token_tree:: Tree token in radius.
You may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Nature's Protector
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Target a unit in range adjacent to a ::token_tree:: Tree token.

name: Toss Away
text: Place a token, or an enemy unit, adjacent to you into a space in range.

name: Tree of Plenty
text:
Remove a ::token_tree:: Tree token in radius.
**Choose one —**
- You may retrieve a discarded card.
- A friendly hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Nature's Guardian
text:
**Choose one —**
- Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Target a unit in range adjacent to a ::token_tree:: Tree token.

name: Mighty Throw
text: Place a token, or an enemy unit, adjacent to you into a space in range.

name: Claim Dominance
text: **This round:** Up to 1 enemy minion adjacent to you do not count towards the minion total during minion battle, regardless of immunity.

name: Trample
text:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore obstacles; each enemy hero you moved through discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to one minion you moved through.

name: Into the Canopy
text:
**Choose one —**
- Swap with a ::token_tree:: Tree token in radius.
- Swap a friendly unit in radius with a Tree token in radius.

name: Abundance
text:
Remove a ::token_tree:: Tree token in radius.
**Choose one or both —**
- You may retrieve a discarded card.
- A friendly hero in radius may retrieve a discarded card.

name: Nature's Champion
text:
**Choose one, or both**, on different targets **—**
- Target a hero adjacent to you.
- Target a unit in range adjacent to a ::token_tree:: Tree token.

name: Monstrous Throw
text: Place a token, or an enemy unit, adjacent to you into a space in range. May repeat once.

name: Assert Dominance
text: **This round:** Up to 2 enemy minions adjacent to you do not count towards the minion total during minion battle, regardless of immunity.

name: Angry Stampede
text:
If you move in a straight line: You may ignore obstacles; each enemy hero you moved through discards a card, or is defeated;
defeat up to two minions you moved through.

name: Treetop Ride
text:
**Choose up to two times —**
- Swap with a ::token_tree:: Tree token in radius.
- Swap a friendly unit in radius with a Tree token in radius.
